:py:mod:`AbstractEvolutionAlg`
==============================

.. py:module:: AbstractEvolutionAlg


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   AbstractEvolutionAlg.AbstractEvolutionAlg




.. py:class:: AbstractEvolutionAlg(init_params)

   Bases: :py:obj:`abc.ABC`

   An abstract class to be inherited by evolutionary algorithms such as
   Differential Evolution, Swarm Particle Optimization etc.
